about_the_game:
To Bring Her Back is all about solving riddles. Unravel mystic poems to discover the correct combination of symbols to draw, and summon demonic creatures that can aid two friends in their dark quest.



Lydia and Darine are two friends who have decided to attempt what even they deem crazy. But attempt it they shall. They must.

Using two ancient tomes they need to figure out the correct combination of symbols to draw in their summoning circle. Lydia holds the Tome of Riddles, where each line secretly refers to a symbol. One which can be found in the Tome of Symbols, held by Darine.

Will they succeed in their dark quest, or will they learn to not mess with the supernatural?



Features:
  • Multiple sets of unique riddles for replayability of the entire game.
  • An emotional story about loss and regret.
  • A level editor to create your own riddles and symbols.
detailed_description:
To Bring Her Back is all about solving riddles. Unravel mystic poems to discover the correct combination of symbols to draw, and summon demonic creatures that can aid two friends in their dark quest.



Lydia and Darine are two friends who have decided to attempt what even they deem crazy. But attempt it they shall. They must.

Using two ancient tomes they need to figure out the correct combination of symbols to draw in their summoning circle. Lydia holds the Tome of Riddles, where each line secretly refers to a symbol. One which can be found in the Tome of Symbols, held by Darine.

Will they succeed in their dark quest, or will they learn to not mess with the supernatural?



Features:
  • Multiple sets of unique riddles for replayability of the entire game.
  • An emotional story about loss and regret.
  • A level editor to create your own riddles and symbols.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 or newer, Debian 10+
  • Processor: Intel or AMD 64-bit capable processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA (Fermi graphics cards or newer), Intel, or AMD graphics card (Radeon HD 5XXX or newer)
  • Storage: 50 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 11 (Big Sur) or later
  • Processor: Any Intel or Apple Silicon processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 50 MB available space

name: To Bring Her Back

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1 compatible graphics card, integrated graphics
  • Storage: 50 MB available space

short_description: Solve riddles from ancient tomes — Two friends gather at a summoning circle, embracing the supernatural in an attempt to achieve the impossible. Unravel mystic poems to discover the correct combination of symbols to draw, and summon demons that can aid these friends in their dark quest.
